Reserva5: *To book more than 5 rooms, please contact the hotel
BienvenidoHotel: Welcome to Hotel Jupiter **** located in the city center of Murcia, Spain. Our hotel offers an intimate atmosphere with a modern and elegant design in all its rooms. With a strategic location in the heart of the city, Hotel Jupiter guarantees maximum comfort for our guests. With a family focus, our hospitality will make your stay in this beautiful historic city unforgettable. Additionally, those who wish to explore the city will find our location extremely convenient, just a 5-minute walk from Plaza de Santo Domingo and a few steps from the main public transportation stations.
DescripcionHabitaciones: Hotel Jupiter has 100 rooms including two Suites with all the necessary amenities. Each room is unique and contains details that pay homage to the Region of Murcia. They are fully equipped with a private bathroom, toiletries, comfortable double beds or twin beds to choose from with high-quality mattresses, minibar, kettle, Smart TV with internet connection, free Wifi, and air conditioning.
DescripcionServicios: Discover all the services offered by Hotel Jupiter. You can enjoy a continental buffet breakfast or private parking among others. If you have any special requests, do not hesitate to contact us to offer you the best possible attention.
HabitacionesDescripcion3: The 100 rooms of Hotel Jupiter with all the services to make your stay the best experience.
HabitacionesDescripcion4: Renovated in 2022, all rooms have a desk, satellite TV, free wifi, hairdryer, and safe.
HabitacionDobleDescripcion: Room with king size bed or two single beds (upon request and availability). Size: 25 m2
HabitacionSupletoriaDescripcion: Room with king size bed or two single beds (upon request and availability) and an extra bed. Size: 35m2
HabitacionSuiteDescripcion: Suite with king size bed. It has a jacuzzi and a living room. Size: 42 m2
GimnasioDescripcion: Stay in shape in our gym equipped with all the necessary tools for the exercise you want to do.
SalonesDescripcion: Hotel Jupiter has different rooms for all types of events. Do not hesitate to consult us about availability and capacities at hoteljupiter@hoteljupiter.com
EligeMayusDescripcion: Add any of these services to your reservation to make your stay more complete.
DesayunoDescripcion1: Enjoy a delicious continental buffet breakfast.
ParkingDescripcion: Leave your vehicle in our secure facilities equipped with spacious spaces and direct access to the hotel.
RomanticaDescripcion: Surprise your partner with a bottle of house wine and a basket of different high-quality chocolates.
Estancia: Make your stay even more comfortable
MejoresOfertas: FIND THE BEST OFFERS IN OUR WEB
